title: Fabrication of a surface molecularly imprinted polymer membrane based on a single template and its application in the separation and extraction of phenytoin, phenobarbital and lamotrigine
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8353-8365
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00294F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yan-lin Zhao, Yu-xin You, Yu-lang Chen, Ying Zhang, Yan Du, Dao-quan Tang
A molecularly imprinted polymer membrane (MIPM) was prepared using PVDF as the support and phenytoin (PHT) as a single template. The results indicated that the MIPMs can be used to extract PHT, phenobarbital, and lamotrigine in different matrices.
